units.name: clean_bbgames.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Removes old ball games from /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/sh -c 'find /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/* -mtime +5 -exec rm {} \;'

units.name: clean_bbgames.timer
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Run clean_bbgames.service every day

[Timer]
OnCalendar=daily

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
